description: Students learn conducting techniques for instrumental literature, including rehearsal techniques, score preparation, and reading the full score. Repertorie includes characteristic examples from standard band and orchestra literature. Students gain practical experience in conducting an instrumental ensemble. Course work includes observation of conducting faculty. Prerequisite: Music 251. Offered annually in the Spring Semester.
name: Instru Conducting
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 251. Offered annually in the Spring Semester.
title: Instrumental Conducting
